meanings.definition: Writing done with a pen or pencil in the hand.
meanings.sent1: Her handwriting was neat and easy to read.
meanings.sent2: I can tell who wrote the letter by their handwriting.
meanings.sent3: His handwriting was so messy, it looked like a spider had danced on the paper.
meanings.sent4: The handwriting of time leaves its mark on all things.
meanings.sent5: The handwriting on the ancient scroll was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: The style or manner in which someone writes with their hand.
meanings.sent1: Each person has a unique handwriting that reflects their personality.
meanings.sent2: Her handwriting is elegant and flowing.
meanings.sent3: His handwriting was so fancy, it seemed to wear a top hat and monocle.
meanings.sent4: The handwriting of the wind on the sand whispered secrets of the desert.
meanings.sent5: The handwriting of the artist on the canvas told a story of passion and creativity.
